name: Startechup Inc.
description:
Startechup Inc. is a Web and Software Development Agency based in Cebu City, Philippines. Startechup specializes in providing IT, Web, and Mobile solutions for some of the most exciting startups and progressive enterprises globally. Startechup Inc. was incorporated in November 2013 for building up a team of talented IT engineers and designers to create the first online application connecting people and NGOs (
www.globedrop.org)
